Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class ManagerDashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.ManagerDashboardController
public class ManagerDashboardController extends Object
Controller for the manager dashboard interface. Manages navigation to various management sections such as sales, menu editing, inventory, employee management, and reports.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading is complete. Sets up the menu selection dropdown with options from the MenuCatalog and ensures no item is pre-selected initially.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of adding an item to the order.

      This method attempts to determine the selected menu item using the following priority:

      1. Dropdown selection (preferred method)
      2. Legacy grid button mapping (fallback for backward compatibility)

      If a valid menu item is identified, it navigates to the order item screen and passes the selected menu item ID to the OrderItemController.

      Parameters:
      event - the action event that triggered this method
      Throws:
      IOException - if the orderItem.fxml file cannot be loaded

    • setEmployee

      public void setEmployee(Employee emp)
      Sets the currently authenticated employee for session management.

      This method allows the App or LoginController to inject the current employee object, enabling session-aware functionality throughout the dashboard interface.

      Parameters:
      emp - the authenticated employee object
